name: HtmlSlide application
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: HTML Slide presentation based on backbone and jquery
body:
### Welcome to HTML Slide
This is a simple application built on backbone and jquery for making presentation slides on HTML.If you don't have MS PowerPoint , you can use this. 

### Prerequisites
* jQuery
* backbone
* underscore
* handlebars

### HTMLSlide API's and Slide Template
#### API
`createSlide`

`createSlidePoints`

#### Template

### How to create Slide
Load the htmlslide.js as part of the prerequisites. It will return you the HTMLSlide class to the window object. Create a instance of it. Use the 
Still in Progress
